basics.label: Business Development Analyst
basics.summary: Extensive Analyst experience with emphasis on Business Development and Data Analytic. Ambitious, detailed-oriented Business Professional with a high degree of mastery in analyzing complex business objectives and meeting deadlines under pressure. Urgently adapts to challenges and changing environments. Achievement-driven with a demonstrated history of exceeding development requirements and problem solving. Top-performing at providing financial support and cultivating lasting customer relationships.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for increasing leadership development for Entry Level Business Analyst. Worked with end users, administrators, stake-holders, and project managers to increase growth for clients. Analyzed system root cause of defects and task/workflows.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Solved time management inefficiencies by assisting customer service in all departments. Improved organizational change strategies with support on documented process functions.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Learned how to analyze different stakeholder objectives and feedback through effectively communicating reports, interview and surveys with top financial analyst.
highlights: Achieved basic financial and operation reporting
Assisted the coordination of Quality Assurance testers for end-to-end unit testing and post-production testing
Drafted financial and resource planning reports
